trans-unit.source: Registers an ECMAScript (JavaScript) file for use on an ASP.NET Web page.
trans-unit.target: Registra un file di ECMAScript (JavaScript) per l'utilizzo in una pagina Web ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: You can include a JavaScript file on an ASP.NET Web page by registering it through a ScriptReference object.
trans-unit.target: È possibile includere un file JavaScript in una pagina Web ASP.NET registrandolo tramite un oggetto ScriptReference.

trans-unit.source: You can register a script file that is located as a .js file (a static script file) on the Web site.
trans-unit.target: È possibile registrare un file di script che si trova come un file con estensione js (un file di script statici) nel sito Web.

trans-unit.source: You can also register a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: È anche possibile registrare un file di script incorporati come risorsa in un assembly.

trans-unit.source: After registering the script file, you can use its functions in client script on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo avere registrato il file di script, è possibile utilizzare le funzioni nello script client nella pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: To register a static script file, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property of the ScriptReference object to the relative location of the file.
trans-unit.target: Per registrare un file script statico, impostare il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto per il percorso relativo del file ScriptReference.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>

trans-unit.source: To register a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> property to the name of the assembly that contains the file.
trans-unit.target: Per registrare un file di script incorporati come risorsa in un assembly, impostare il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A>proprietà sul nome dell'assembly che contiene il file.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> property to the name of the .js file that is embedded in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: Impostare quindi la <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>proprietà sul nome del file con estensione js è incorporato nell'assembly.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the script file must be embedded, not linked.
trans-unit.target: In tal caso, il file di script deve essere incorporato, non è collegato.

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ScriptMode%2A> property to indicate whether to use the debug or release version of the script.
trans-unit.target: Impostare la <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ScriptMode%2A>proprietà per indicare se utilizzare il debug o alla versione dello script.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.ScriptMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode> value produces different results depending on whether it refers to a standalone script file or to a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode>valore produce risultati diversi a seconda che faccia riferimento a un file di script autonomo o in un file di script incorporati come risorsa in un assembly.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode>

trans-unit.source: A standalone script file is defined with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Un file script autonomo viene definito con la <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>

trans-unit.source: An assembly reference must be accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Un riferimento all'assembly deve essere accessibili mediante il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The results for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode> value are as follows: - When it is applied to a standalone script file where the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property is specified, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode> value is equivalent to <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode>.
trans-unit.target: I risultati per il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode>valore sono i seguenti: - quando viene applicato a un file di script autonomo in cui il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>proprietà viene specificata, il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode>valore è equivalente a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode>

trans-unit.source: - When it is applied to a script reference in an assembly, <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode> is equivalent to <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode>.
trans-unit.target: -Quando viene applicata a un riferimento a script in un assembly, <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode>è equivalente a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode>

trans-unit.source: When only <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> is specified, it is used to reference the script.
trans-unit.target: Quando una sola <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>viene specificato, viene utilizzato per fare riferimento a script.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property are both specified, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property is used instead of <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>, but the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode> value is still equivalent to <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>proprietà sono entrambi specificati, il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>proprietà viene usata invece di <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>, ma il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode>valore è sempre equivalente a <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> class by using a specified path.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref> classe utilizzando un percorso specificato.

trans-unit.source: The path of the client script file relative to the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso del file di script client rispetto alla pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> class by using a specified name and assembly.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref> classe utilizzando un nome specificato e un assembly.

trans-unit.source: The name of the script file that is embedded in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del file di script che è incorporato nell'assembly.

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly that contains the client script file as an embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: Il nome dell'assembly che contiene il file di script client come una risorsa incorporata.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the assembly that contains the client script file as an embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome dell'assembly che contiene il file di script client come una risorsa incorporata.

trans-unit.source: You set the Assembly property when you reference a client script file that is included as an embedded resource in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Impostare la proprietà Assembly quando si fa riferimento a un file di script client è incluso come risorsa incorporata in un assembly.

trans-unit.source: Set Assembly to the fully qualified or partially qualified assembly name.
trans-unit.target: Impostare l'Assembly per il nome completo o parziale dell'assembly.

trans-unit.source: A fully qualified assembly name includes a name, culture, public key, and version number.
trans-unit.target: Un nome completo dell'assembly include un nome, le impostazioni cultura, chiave pubblica e il numero di versione.

trans-unit.source: A partially qualified assembly name includes only a name.
trans-unit.target: Un nome di assembly parziali include solo un nome.

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for Assembly, you must also specify the name of the embedded resource in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando si specifica un valore per l'Assembly, è necessario specificare anche il nome della risorsa incorporata nel <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>verrà generata.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The assembly being referenced must be located in either the Bin folder of the Web site or in the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: Riferimento all'assembly deve trovarsi nella cartella Bin del sito Web o nella global assembly cache.

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified or partially qualified name of the assembly that contains a client script file as an embedded resource.
trans-unit.target: Il nome completo o parziale dell'assembly che contiene un file di script client come risorsa incorporata.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the URL that is rendered as the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_src" name="src" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Recupera l'URL che viene eseguito il rendering come valore della <xref uid="langword_csharp_src" name="src" href=""> </xref> attributo del <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScriptManager" name="ScriptManager" href=""></xref> control on the target Web page.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScriptManager" name="ScriptManager" href=""> </xref> controllo nella pagina Web di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the script should be compressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se lo script deve essere compresso. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the URL that is rendered as the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_src" name="src" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'URL a cui viene eseguito il rendering come valore della <xref uid="langword_csharp_src" name="src" href=""> </xref> attributo del <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath*> property is included in the URL when you register a client script file from a resource.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath*>proprietà è inclusa nell'URL quando si registra un file di script client da una risorsa.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath*>

trans-unit.source: You set IgnoreScriptPath to `true` when you want to register a client script file without including the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath%2A> value in the URL of the script file.
trans-unit.target: Impostare IgnoreScriptPath `true` quando si desidera registrare un file di script client senza includere il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath%2A>valore nell'URL del file di script.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ScriptPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the script path is not used when you register the client script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il percorso dello script non viene utilizzato quando si registra lo script client. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the script reference is an AJAX script.
trans-unit.target: Determina se il riferimento allo script è uno script AJAX.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the script reference is an AJAX script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il riferimento allo script è uno script AJAX; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the composite script contains a reference to an ASP.NET AJAX framework script.
trans-unit.target: Indica se lo script composito contiene un riferimento a uno script del framework ASP.NET AJAX.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the composite script contains a reference to an ASP.NET AJAX framework script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se lo script composito contiene un riferimento a uno script del framework ASP.NET AJAX; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the embedded resource that contains the client script file.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome della risorsa incorporata contenente il file di script client.

trans-unit.source: You set the Name property to reference a client script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Impostare la proprietà Name per fare riferimento a un file di script client incorporato come risorsa in un assembly.

trans-unit.source: If you define values for both the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> and Name properties in the same script reference, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Se si definiscono valori per entrambe le <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>e le proprietà di nome nello stesso riferimento allo script, il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>proprietà ha la precedenza.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the client script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del file di script client incorporato come risorsa in un assembly.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name*> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path*> property, or the type name.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una stringa che rappresenta il valore della <> </> *> proprietà, il <> </> *> proprietà o il nome del tipo.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name*> property if it is defined, or the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path*> property if it is defined; otherwise, the value of the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name*> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della <> </> *> proprietà se è definito o il valore del <> </> *> proprietà se è definito; in caso contrario, il valore della <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name*>proprietà.</xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name*>
